org.fife.rsta.ui

Class DecorativeIconPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.fife.rsta.ui.DecorativeIconPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AssistanceIconPanel

    public class DecorativeIconPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A panel that displays an 8x8 decorative icon for a component, such as a text field or combo box. This can be used to display error icons, warning icons, etc.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Robert Futrell
    See Also:
    AssistanceIconPanel, Serialized Form
